title: Crystal Raine
description: For a thousand years, the High Elven have hidden from the world. Now, they are dying out and a young girl braves the outside world to find the answers they need. But her unexpected friendship with a human knight puts the High Elven at risk and she is banished. Hated by her elven kin, with only Dafydd mac Cuill as her guide, Raine must find her way in a new and increasingly hostile world. Even disguised as a human, Raine is hunted by those who would use her power for their own ends. Somehow, she must avoid capture and find a way to save her people before an ancient evil is roused once more.
author: Deborah McNemar
